name: Expectium Protocol
description: Expectium is an information markets platform that lets you trade on the worldâ€™s most highly-debated topics (e.g. politics, current events, etc). On Expectium, you build a portfolio based on your forecasts and earn a return if you are right. When you decide to buy shares in a market, you are weighing in with your own knowledge and research. As a result, Expectium is a leading source of unbiased and real-time data about future events.
